channel.title: Custom Model Problem, Any Ideas? Paying for Fix!
channel.description:
Ok so i recently realized i cannot recolour a whip to make lime.. lava.. ect. there is a code you can use for other servers such as modifiedColor = and originalColor = but my source doesnt have that. so i have resorted to custom making the models custom. my friend Sir Chase ( a beast at everything about RSPS's) has decided to help me with this if i pay. so i am going to. he has gotten very far. there is one thing that needs to be changed. [b]When you equip the whip, This random line of color is attatched from the characters hand to the bottom of the whip. i was wondering if any of you model experts out there know how to fix this![/b] i bet chase can figure it out, but this could help a lot if one of you could give me some info. thanks! here are some pictures. the model pic, and the pictures of the line of color when wielding. ( the line of color from the characters hand to the bottom of the whip)
http://www.freeimagehosting.net/9ar83 (Model) http://www.freeimagehosting.net/6ud3a http://www.freeimagehosting.net/8eai2 http://www.freeimagehosting.net/pjw35
If anyone can fix this for all (i think 5) of my custom whips then ill pay $5! paypal. please help me! - fluffys

item.title: Custom Model Problem, Any Ideas? Paying for Fix!
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

think u can give it a try with one of my whips? pink one would work i guess. i have t.v? if u try for like 30 minutes and still dont get it ill pay you $1 haha for effort paypal

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Model Problem, Any Ideas? Paying for Fix!

@Fluffys wrote:

Ok so i recently realized i cannot recolour a whip to make lime… lava… ect. there is a code you can use for other servers such as modifiedColor = and originalColor = but my source doesnt have that. so i have resorted to custom making the models custom. my friend Sir Chase ( a beast at everything about RSPS’s) has decided to help me with this if i pay. so i am going to. he has gotten very far. there is one thing that needs to be changed. When you equip the whip, This random line of color is attatched from the characters hand to the bottom of the whip. i was wondering if any of you model experts out there know how to fix this! i bet chase can figure it out, but this could help a lot if one of you could give me some info. thanks! here are some pictures. the model pic, and the pictures of the line of color when wielding.
